Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.utils

Various utility classes used by Hedera identity frameworks.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InstantTypeAdapter
    Gson type adapter for Instant type and configurable date/time string format.
    Iso8601InstantTypeAdapter
    Gson type adapter for serialization/deserialization between Instant and ISO 8601 date format.
    JsonUtils
    JSON utilities for Hedera identity.
    SingleToArrayTypeAdapterFactory<E>  
    Validator
    Validator allows implementing classes to run validation checks and gather all errors.

Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.utils Description

Various utility classes used by Hedera identity frameworks.
